TextView.android:text: Community Pharmacy Monthly Summary Form
Anambra
Onitsha
Ward III
Community Pharmacy:
Green Life Pharmacy
Reorting Period: Month:
December
Data Elements/Indicators
Community ART Refills
Number of ART clients devolved to the Community Pharmacy to receive ART refills (CUMMULATIVE)
Number of ART clients devolved to the Community Pharmacy to receive ART refills this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who were scheduled to access ART refills in community pharmacy this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who accessed ART refills within 7 days of appointment in community pharmacy this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who defaulted to come for a refill within 7 days of the appointment date at the Community Pharmacy this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who defaulted to come for a refill within 7 days of appointment, were tracked or not and did not return for ART refill at the Community Pharmacy this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who received refills for Cotrimoxazole prophylaxis (CTX) this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who received refill for Isoniazid prophylaxis (INH) this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who were provided Chronic Care Screening services using care and support checklist this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who had medication adherence issue(s) this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients with suspected Adverse Drug Reactions (ADRs) this reporting month
Number of individual case safety reports form [ADR reports] filled for devolved clients this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who are eligible to return back to Hospital for semiannual clinical and laboratory reassements this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who are eligible for viral load re-assessment this reporting month
Community Pharmacy & Health Facility Linkage
Number of devolved ART clients who had clinical or/and laboratory re-assessments done at the hospital with new ART prescriptions for Community ART refills this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who accessed viral load re-assessment with viral load test result this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who had viral load re-assessment & are virologically suppressed (VL < 1000 c/ml) this reporting month
Number of devolved ART clients who discontinued Community ART refill services and returned back to the Hospital to continue ART refill services this reporting month
HIV Testing Services
Number of Clients Tested for HIV, Counselled & Received results this reporting month
Number of clients who tested positive for HIV this reporting month
Number of HIV positive clients who were referred for ART and related services this reporting month
No. of Community-based external on-site monitoring visit(s) conducted this reporting period using standard check list
